div.ab:
إحسانه إليكم
كتابي هذا وأنا بحال عافية وسلامة وللّه الحمد لا شريك له ووصل
كتابكم مع الحارس في المركب فـسرّني سلامكم أجمعين أدام اللّه
لكم السّلامة والعافية وأنا بحمد اللّه في كل عافية وقد نفع مغذي معدتي
الورد بإذن اللّه وقد وجّهت إليك بامة ودنيل بالقفاف وهي أربع قفاف
جياد كبار للمر المرـ وما وجّهت إلّا بعد
الجمعة لأن النّاس مشغولون بالزّرع ولو كان الجدا قد ولدت لوجّهت
إليك قرأت الپك وعلى ابن أبي الحسن وأخيه والخوات وأم علي وست ماهر
وولد وأبي عبد اللّه أعزّهم اللّه السّلم لكم الكثير الطيّب وغير ونحن منكمشون في الزّرع
بمعونة اللّه عز وجل وأرجوا أترحّل إليكم قريبا إن شا اللّه
ولو ذهبت أصف كــل شي لكم ولأم علي والصّبيان لوصفت عظيما لا أوحش اللّه
منكم وصانكم الضّر الصّدر والضّل وأجلّ

*** ʾiḥsāna hu ʾilay kum
kitāb ī hāḏā wa ʾanā bi ḥāli ʿāfiyaẗ:in wa salāmaẗ:in wa li l lāhi ăl ḥamdu lā šarīka la hu wa waṣala
kitābu kum maʿa ăl ḥārisi fī ăl markabi fa sarra nī salāmu kum ʾaǧmaʿīna ʾadāma ăl lāhu
la kum ăs salāmaẗa wa ăl ʿāfiyaẗa wa ʾanā bi ḥamdi ăl lāhi fī kulli ʿāfiyaẗ:in wa qad nafaʿa maġḏiyyu miʿdaẗ ø ī
ăl wardu wurdi bi ʾiḏni ăl lāhi wa qad waǧǧahtu ʾilay ka bāmaẗa wa danīla bi ăl qufāfi wa hiya ʾarbaʿu qufāf:in
ǧiyād:in kibāri kibār:in li l ăl mr*** *** wa mā waǧǧahtu ʾillā baʿda
ăl ǧumʿaẗi li ʾanna ăn nāsa mašġūlūna bi ăz zarʿi wa law kāna ăl ǧidāʾu qad wulidat la waǧǧahtu
ʾilay ka qaraʾtu ʿalay ka wa ʿalà ĭbni ʾabī ăl ḥasani wa ʾaḫī hi wa ăl ḫawāti wa ʾummi ʿaliyy:in wa sitti māhir:in
wa waladi ʾabī ʿabdi ăl lāhi ʾaʿazza humu ăl lāhu ăs salāmu la ăl kumu kaṯīru ăṭ ṭayyibu wa ġayr naḥnu munkamišūna fī ăz zarʿi
bi maʿūnaẗi ăl lāhi ʿazza wa ǧalla wa ʾarǧū ʾataraḥḥalu ʾilay kumu qarīb:an ʾin šāʾa ăl lāhu
wa law ḏahabtu ʾaṣifu kulla šayʾ:in la kum wa li ʾummi ʿaliyy:in wa ăṣ ṣibyāni la waṣaftu ʿaẓīm:an lā ʾawḥaša ăl lāhu
min kum wa ṣāna kumu ăḍ ăṣ ḍurra ṣadru wa ăḍ ʾaǧallu ø ḍulla

[...] His goodness to you.
I am writing to you in a state of health and well-being, praise be to God, who has no partner.
Your letter arrived with the guard in the ship. I was pleased to hear that you are all well. May God prolong
... Mir geht es durch die Gnade Gottes gut, nachdem die Rosen(konfitüre) meinem Magen geholfen hat your health and well-being. I am in good health, praise be to God. The young horses have done well,
with God's permission. I have sent Bame and Danīl to you with the baskets. They are four excellent, large baskets. with God's permission. I have sent Pameh and Danil to you with the baskets. They are four excellent, large baskets.
... [ ] ... I only sent after ... [ ] ... I only sent (them) after
Friday since the people are busy on the land. If the kids had been born I would have written
... Ich sende Dir ... to you. I send best wishes to you and ʾIbn al-Ḥasan, his brothers and sisters, ʾUmm ʿAlī, Sitt Māhir to you. I send best wishes to you and Ibn al-Hasan, his brothers and sisters, Umm ʿAli, Sitt Mahir
and the boys of ʿAbdallah, may God give them strength and (I hope you) are not flagging in the sowing, and the boys of ʿAbdallāh, may God give them strength and (I hope you) are not flagging in the sowing, ... viele gute Grüsse. Wir konzentrieren uns auf die Aussaat.
with the help of God, he is powerful and exalted. I hope to come to you shortly, God willing.
If I were to tell every thing to you, ʾUmm ʿAlī and the boys I would go on too long. May God not take (me) away
from you. May he protect you against harm and humiliation. May God not take you away (from me). May he protect you from harm and humiliation.
